title: BarcodePro 8.1 – Professional Barcode Builder
content: A barcode is an optical machine-readable representation of data relating to the object to which it is attached. Originally barcodes systematically represented data by varying the widths and spacings of parallel lines, and may be referred to as linear or one-dimensional (1D). Later they evolved into rectangles, dots, hexagons and other geometric patterns in two […]

title: Visio Viewer 3.0.0 – A fast Visio file viewer for Mac
content: Enolsoft Visio Viewer is a fast Visio file viewer for Mac users to easily open and read Microsoft Visio files, as well as convert the Visio drawing documents to PDF file or print out.   Highlight: Open and view any .vsd & .vsdx files quickly and easily on Mac. title: Star Vikings 1.0.1 – A casual Puzzle/RPG fun game
content: Star Vikings is a casual Puzzle/RPG that is fun, easy to get into and that respects players’ intelligence. title: NECROPOLIS: BRUTAL EDITION 1.1.1 – Third-person Action & Adventure Game
content: NECROPOLIS: BRUTAL EDITION is a major update featuring a new playable adventurer (The Brute), a completely new outdoor environment (The Black Forest), and lots of new enemies, weapons, armor, traps, potions, scrolls, and other big improvements to the game.   The BRUTAL EDITION is the definitive NECROPOLIS experience. title: Syndrome 1.0 – A sci-fi survival horror game
content: You wake up dazed and confused, probably from the effects of cryosleep.   No one can be seen around, but you soon start to find the bodies of your dead crewmen.   The ship is adrift, and whoever – or whatever – killed your crewmates is probably still around.   Syndrome is a sci-fi survival […]

title: Project Highrise 1.0.6 – A skyscraper construction and management sim [Native]
content: Your job as the architect and developer is to build world-famous skyscrapers that will be the envy of the entire city, masterpieces of art and engineering. But a skyscraper is more than just steel and glass, it’s an intricate ecosystem, full of people that live and work in the building. They become a complex machine […]

title: The Warlock of Firetop Mountain 1.0 – Action, RPG & Board Game
content: The Warlock of Firetop Mountain is a tabletop adventure come to life! This fantasy solo RPG combines unique, simultaneous turn-based combat with a journey that changes based on each figurine you take into Firetop Mountain! title: CopyLess 1.8.10 – Store and access up to 100 clipboard items
